autoContrast.description: Determines whether button text color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有填充变体的按钮文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

children *.description: label element associated with the input

color.description: Controls components colors based on variant prop. Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color. theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: 根据 variant 属性控制组件颜色。theme.colors 的 Key 或任何有效的 CSS 颜色。theme.primaryColor 默认

defaultChecked.description: Default checked state for uncontrolled component
defaultChecked.description_zh: 非受控零部件的默认选中状态

icon.description: Any element or component to replace default icon
icon.description_zh: 要替换 default 图标的任何元素或组件

id.description: Static id to connect input with the label, by default id is randomly generated
id.description_zh: static id 连接 input 和标签，默认 id 是随机生成的

onChange.description_zh: 在选中的状态更改时调用

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, 'xl' by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认设置 border-radius，'xl'

rootRef.description: Assigns ref of the root element

size.description: Controls various properties related to component size, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制与组件大小相关的各种属性，默认为 'sm'

wrapperProps.description: Props passed down to the root element
wrapperProps.description_zh: 向下传递到根元素的 props
